dct_title_s: Paradisi terrestris vera et sacris literis conformis exhibitio geographica
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Illustrations of animals throughout the map.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, places of historical interest.
2 pictorial vignettes: [Adam and Eve, attacked by an angel] -- [Adam and Eve with animals and the serpent].
Descriptive text below ancillary map and title cartouche: [Psalm 48] -- [Ecclesiastes 17].
Labels throughout map: Fol. E. -- Fig. L. -- Fol. I. -- Fig. 2.
Ancillary map: [Celestial map showing the signs of the zodiac].
Appears in Scherer's Atlas marianus. Muenchen, 1702.
